title: Nintendo Switch Pro Controller Setup Guide
description: Complete guide to setting up your Nintendo Switch Pro Controller on various platforms
author: Padpedia Team

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
The Nintendo Switch Pro Controller is a premium gamepad that works seamlessly with Nintendo Switch and PC. This guide will help you set it up properly.

What you'll need:

  • Nintendo Switch Pro Controller
  • USB-C cable (for initial setup)
  • Device with Bluetooth capability

content.caption: Nintendo Switch Pro Controller front view showing all buttons
Back view with USB-C charging port

sections.title: Nintendo Switch Setup
sections.content:
Connecting to Nintendo Switch

  1. Turn on your Nintendo Switch console
  2. Go to System Settings > Controllers and Sensors
  3. Select 'Change Grip/Order'
  4. Press and hold the sync button on the Pro Controller for 3 seconds
  5. The controller will appear on screen when connected

Note: The Pro Controller will automatically connect when the console is turned on.

sections.title: PC Setup (Windows)
sections.content:
Steam Setup

Steam has built-in support for Nintendo Switch Pro Controller:

  1. Connect controller via USB-C or Bluetooth
  2. Open Steam and go to Settings > Controller
  3. Enable 'Nintendo Switch Pro Configuration Support'
  4. Your controller is now ready to use

Bluetooth Pairing

  1. Hold the sync button for 3 seconds until lights flash
  2. Go to Windows Settings > Devices > Bluetooth
  3. Select 'Pro Controller' from the list
  4. Click 'Pair' to complete setup
